job description:
Join Reynolds Consumer Products… a world of opportunities! At Reynolds Consumer Products we are passionate about achieving results and have fun winning as a team! We provide amazing job opportunities for growth with competitive salaries and benefits in an exciting, dynamic, fast-paced, and fun workplace environment. Are you looking to build a strong career and make a positive impact? Then we have an opportunity for you! We are searching for an SAP Master Data Governance-Associate Analyst to join our team located at our headquarters in Lake Forest, IL. (northern suburbs of Chicago, IL)

Your Role:

As an SAP Master Data Governance-Associate Analyst, you will develop and communicate key documentation related to internal Data Governance rules regarding acceptable attribute values and processes. You will have the opportunity to:
  • Identify patterns, trends and inconsistencies, draw conclusions and provide recommendations in the form of remediation, corrective actions and preventative actions.
  • Manage large spreadsheets of data to improve data quality
  • Develop reports to extract data from SAP
  • Maintain and prioritize project work plans
Ultimately, you will collaborate directly with the business data owners to establish the quality business rules that will provide the foundation for data quality improvement plan.

You will love it here if…
  • You are analytic and an expert problem-solver
  • You are results oriented
  • You thrive under pressure in a fast-paced environment
  • You can successfully juggle multiple tasks at once
We need you to have:
  • Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or Management Information Systems
  • 2+ years as a Master Data Analyst or Supply Chain Analyst with reporting analytics experience
  • Advanced experience using Microsoft Excel (pivot tables,) and Access
  • Experience providing a consolidated view of data for analysis and decision making purposes
  • 2+ year’s SAP ECC 6.0 experience
  • 2+ years’ SAP Master Data maintenance experience
Icing on the cake:
  • SAP Business Warehouse (BW) experience
  • Winshuttle experience
Want to know more? Check out our website or connect with us on LinkedIn!
